survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Hybrid Work Model Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees on their satisfaction and experiences with the hybrid work model implemented by the company.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the hybrid work model (a mix of remote and in-office work)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and consistency. Ensure options are evenly spaced for accurate data collection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the hybrid work model (a mix of remote and in-office work)?

questions.question_text: What are the primary benefits you experience with the hybrid work model? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Better focus with fewer office distractions
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse employee experiences. Include an 'Other' option for unlisted benefits.

script.question_text: What are the primary benefits you experience with the hybrid work model? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face with the hybrid work model? (Select all that apply)

Difficulty separating work from personal life
